title: Bobby Interviews Amy's Son + Lunchbox Wants To Make A Citizen's Arrest
itunes:title: Bobby Interviews Amy's Son + Lunchbox Wants To Make A Citizen's Arrest
description:
Bobby talks to Amy's son Stevenson about a spanking he got recently. Lunchbox puts a law breaker on blast. Also, the crew goes head to head in a round of Riddle Me This.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
